headline: Ariel Focus Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: In Q4 2024, Ariel Focus Fund outperformed the Russell 1000 Value Index, marginally falling -1.19% versus -1.98% for its primary benchmark. Click here to read the full commentary.

headline: A Look Back at Home Furnishings Stocks’ Q4 Earnings: La-Z-Boy (NYSE:LZB) Vs The Rest Of The Pack
summary: Wrapping up Q4 earnings, we look at the numbers and key takeaways for the home furnishings stocks, including La-Z-Boy (NYSE:LZB) and its peers.
